Who We Are » ECI ECI ENES Menu Company Who We Are Leadership Our Companies Business Ethics Markets Solutions Operations Operational Excellence Global Locations COVID-19 Newsroom Careers Customers Suppliers Contact EN ES Who We Are Who We Are About ECI Founded in 1953, Electrical Components International (ECI) is one of the world’s leading suppliers of electrical distribution systems, control box assemblies, and other critical engineered components for diversified markets. With 25,000 employees and 40 global manufacturing locations, ECI is the trusted partner to market leaders with 500+ customers. At ECI, we power smart, connected, and electrified solutions that enable the most advanced technologies to solve the most complex challenges. Our commitment to operational and commercial excellence begins with our commitment to ethical excellence. We deliver results as One Team and follow through on our promises. We Supply Critical Components Our wire harnesses are the central nervous system for all electrical applications and the critical component required to distribute electricity across technology platforms. Our experienced engineers are embedded with our customer teams to collaborate on the design and delivery of tailored solutions to meet their complex requirements across a wide array of industries. Markets We Manage Complexity We have the global expertise to uniquely manage highly complex product, demand, manufacturing, and delivery requirements. Our manufacturing capabilities enable us to meet both high volume, low mix and low volume, high mix customer requirements. Solutions We Are Where You Are We are located where our customers need us. With our global best cost manufacturing footprint, we serve customers worldwide. Our manufacturing centers of excellence are strategically placed to produce dedicated, regional solutions to ensure quality, efficiency, and an integrated production process. Operations Our History: A Legacy of Progress From our strong roots in wire harnesses, we have built our legacy on providing customer solutions by focusing on technology leadership and operational excellence. We continue to enhance our global manufacturing footprint, while expanding our product portfolio into diversified markets. 1953 ECI founded under the name Burcliff Industries 1994 Acquired GE's Captive wire harness business Mid-1990s Consolidated 12 facilities into two Mexican facilities 1998 Opened greenfield facility in Chihuahua, MX 2000 Viasystems goes public after acquiring wire harness business from Int'l Wire 2003 Opened greenfield facility in Guangzhou, China 2004 Opened greenfield facility in Juarez, Mexico 2006 Acquired "Wire Harness Industries" from Viasystems Group 2006 Acquired Cabind; Opened greenfield facility in Huizhou, China 2007 Acquired Noma from GenTek 2008 Opened greenfield facility in Bielsko Biala, Poland 2013 Acquired Incaelec 2014 Opened greenfield facility in Tangier, Morocco 2015 Acquired GHS 2016 Acquired Whitepath 2017 Acquired Fargo 2018 Opened 2 new greenfield facilities in Mexico 2019 Acquired NRI Electronics 2019 Opened 2 new greenfield facilities in Mexico 2021 Acquired Omni Connection 2021 Acquired Promark Electronics 2021 Acquired Rochester Industrial Controls 2022 Acquired BHC Cable Assemblies 2022 Acquired Britech 2022 Acquired Manufacturing Resource Group 2023 Acquired Aerosystems International, Inc. Our Companies » ECI ECI ENES Menu Company Who We Are Leadership Our Companies Business Ethics Markets Solutions Operations Operational Excellence Global Locations COVID-19 Newsroom Careers Customers Suppliers Contact EN ES Our Companies Who We Are Our Companies A Commitment To Growth We continue to grow our leadership position through strategic acquisitions. These partnerships expand our expertise in diversified markets and allow us to continue to provide the most advanced electrical solutions to customers across the globe. May 2021 Omni Connection International Omni Connection International Omni manufactures wire harnesses and connection systems for leading Tier 1 automotive suppliers and is well-positioned to benefit from the long-term growth expected with automotive Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS). Family-owned and managed since its founding in 1991, the company provides high-quality wire harness solutions for applications including smart mirrors, cameras, lamps, and other peripheral electronics. Omni is supported by 1,300 team members across the globe with facilities in the United States, China, and the Philippines. www.omni-conn.com June 2021 Promark Electronics Promark Electronics Founded in 1987 by Syd Knecht, Promark Electronics is a manufacturer of wire harnesses and cable and electromechanical assemblies utilized by commercial electric vehicles and other technically-complex, mission-critical products. With the growing demand for commercial electric vehicles, Promark Electronics has developed high-voltage cable and assemblies as part of its ProEV™ platform, which has made it a trusted partner to leading commercial electric vehicle manufacturers. The company operates two facilities in Montreal, QC. www.pmk.com August 2021 Rochester Industrial Control Rochester Industrial Control Founded in 1967, RIC is a manufacturer of high-voltage wire harnesses, cables, and electromechanical assemblies for the commercial electric vehicle, oil and gas, and medical markets. With its custom, engineered solutions RIC is a leading provider of high-voltage cables to customers in the North American transit bus industry. www.rochesterindustrial.com January 2022 BHC Cable Assemblies BHC Cable Assemblies BHC Cable Assemblies (BHC) is a manufacturer of wire harnesses, cable assemblies, and electromechanical assemblies for Fortune 500 companies. Since its founding in 1998, BHC has become a trusted provider of customized, engineered solutions to the medical, aerospace, renewable energy and entertainment markets. The company operates two facilities in Burlington, Ontario, Canada. December 2022 Britech Britech Established in 1991, Britech is a quality-driven contract manufacture specializing in cables and harnesses, control panels, engineering services, testing, and turnkey manufacturing, located in Allentown, PA. We’re in the business of providing solutions, and our success is ultimately tied to your success. Britech brings engineering expertise, material and tooling to provide you with the right product at the right price and at the right time. December 2022 Manufacturing Resource Group Inc. Manufacturing Resource Group Inc. Based in Norwood, Massachusetts, Manufacturing Resource Group Inc. (MRG) is a leader in electro-mechanical and cable assembly manufacturing. Since its founding in 1988, MRG has become a trusted provider of cable and electro-mechanical assemblies including, battery cable, multi conductor, din rail assembly, fan trays, and box build products. April 2023 Aerosystems International, Inc. Aerosystems International, Inc. Based in Saint-Laurent, Montreal, Aerosystems International, Inc. (ASI) is an AS9100 certified manufacturer, providing specialized manufacturing services for electrical distribution and control systems to the aerospace industry. Since its founding in 1971, ASI has become a trusted partner to the aerospace industry for its quality, service, and delivery to leading aerospace OEMs globally. Global Operations & Logistics » ECI ECI ENES Menu Company Who We Are Leadership Our Companies Business Ethics Markets Solutions Operations Operational Excellence Global Locations COVID-19 Newsroom Careers Customers Suppliers Contact EN ES Operations Operations Committed to Operational Excellence Our world-class manufacturing operations set us apart from our competitors. Utilizing the latest wire harness manufacturing technology, we ensure superior quality and performance of our products across all our plants. We drive operational excellence through a culture of zero defect, lean manufacturing, and continuous improvement. Our commitment to on-time delivery and best-in-class service to our customers is our highest priority. To support this goal, we use advanced analytics to anticipate demand levels and manage customer orders from raw material ordering to inventory management to finished goods and logistics. Our Global Locations Our facilities are strategically located around our customers to meet their needs with responsiveness and service. Our Locations Our COVID-19 Response Throughout the COVID-19 crisis, ECI has been dedicated to the safety of our employees and our customers. We remain committed to excellence in operations and have minimized disruptions through our world-class operating platform. Our COVID-19 Response » ECI ECI ENES Menu Company Who We Are Leadership Our Companies Business Ethics Markets Solutions Operations Operational Excellence Global Locations COVID-19 Newsroom Careers Customers Suppliers Contact EN ES COVID-19 Response Operations COVID-19 ECI Cares – Safety Contingency Measures Our 25,000 employees globally are continuing to support our customers, as all of us are living with the new realities of Covid-19. We are proud of the great commitment of our teams in continuing operations to serve our customers operating essential businesses. As we continue to operate, the health and safety of our employees, our customers, and all those involved in our operations are our first priority. We are closely following the World Health Organizations (WHO) and Centers for Disease Control’s (CDC) guidelines and recommendations on the steps we can take to help prevent the spread of the virus. ECI is facilitating the use of video technology to enable remote work and workshops and continually optimizing the supply chain to anticipate and avoid disruption. Actions At Our Manufacturing Facilities Hygiene We are emphasizing proper hygiene in the plants. This includes signage, training and proper supplies for frequent hand washing as well as cleaning of equipment and workstations regularly. Personal Protective Equipment We require the use of protective equipment including masks in our production facilities. Social Distancing We have implemented staggered shifts and lunches, as well as, floor markings and/or barriers on production floors to further promote social distancing. Cleaning/Disinfecting We have heightened cleaning protocols at each plant which includes increasing the frequency of cleanings. Screening We have implemented temperature screening and questionnaire protocols for all employees at our facilities. Actions At All Sites Remote Work All employees, with the ability to work from home, are required to do so to minimize the number of employees on site and help with maintaining social distance. Exposure For any colleagues who have had direct exposure or live with others under a medically advised quarantine, they have been required to self-monitor at home for 14 days. Policies We have adjusted leave policies to accommodate those affected by Covid-19. Travel We have eliminated any travel unless absolutely necessary for all of our employees. We are requiring employees who have traveled to high-risk locations or have been exposed to others who have traveled to high-risk locations to stay at home/self-quarantine. Visitors We have minimized acceptance of visitors. When visitors are necessary, we have implemented strict on-site visitor protocols to reduce the chance of exposing employees to COVID-19. Markets We Serve » ECI ECI ENES Menu Company Who We Are Leadership Our Companies Business Ethics Markets Solutions Operations Operational Excellence Global Locations COVID-19 Newsroom Careers Customers Suppliers Contact EN ES Who We Serve Markets Supporting Industry Leaders ECI designs and builds critical electrical solutions that can withstand the most challenging environments and specifications. Our diverse industry expertise and manufacturing capabilities enable us to meet any combination of mix and volume for the markets we serve. Agriculture & Construction Learn More Agriculture & Construction ECI is a long-standing provider of wire harnesses to the largest Agriculture and Construction OEMs globally. Our electrical distribution systems ensure critical equipment like skid-steer loaders, excavators, combines, and sprayers power-up and are ready to tackle every job. Our wire harnesses are engineered to meet the complex requirements of Smart Industrial technologies. We customize our electrical distribution systems to service the most advanced smart machines, systems, and solutions with power and precision. Contact Us Automotive Learn More Automotive For over 27 years, we have manufactured wire harnesses for Automotive suppliers, with a primary focus on harnesses used for interior and exterior mirrors. As the technology behind Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) becomes more advanced, ECI is responding with more complex and innovative harness solutions for cameras, lamps, and other peripheral electronics. Our electrical distribution systems are behind the intelligent mobile solutions that are making vehicles the safest yet. Together, these solutions will accelerate the demand and adoption of ADAS globally. Contact Us Specialty Transportation Learn More Specialty Transportation ECI develops and manufactures low-voltage and high-voltage cables and custom assemblies for traditional, electric, and hybrid vehicles. Our proprietary ProEV™ high-voltage cables and value-add manufacturing are built to support advanced e-mobility applications. We have the flexibility, agility, and engineering expertise to develop custom harnesses tailored to our customers’ requirements across a variety of commercial vehicle classes. We design advanced electrical solutions to the volume and mix required for class 6-8 trucks, school buses, transit buses, and emergency vehicles. Contact Us Home Appliance Learn More Home Appliance ECI’s roots are in Home Appliance and since 1953, we have built a legacy of leadership in the space. We are the global leader of wire harnesses and control boxes to the largest Appliance OEMs. Our scale and supplier relationships make ECI the top buyer of UL wire and appliance connectors and terminals globally. Our deep industry experience and dedicated Home Appliance manufacturing facilities ensure quality, speed, and service. Contact Us HVAC Learn More HVAC ECI is the leading supplier to HVAC OEMs in North America. Our wire harnesses, configured control box assemblies, and engineered compressor plugs provide a total solution for residential and commercial HVAC applications. Our engineers have decades of experience developing proprietary compressor plugs that exceed our customers’ expectations and provide industry-leading performance and quality. We have the expertise and scale to manage complex engineering specifications with speed and precision. Contact Us Industrial Machinery & Equipment Learn More Industrial Machinery & Equipment ECI manufactures electrical systems for heavy equipment and material handling. Our harnesses support a variety of applications in cranes, tractors, generators, scissor lifts, lift trucks, forklifts, and more. Our dedicated manufacturing facilities execute rapid engineering changes with flexibility and speed. We have the scale and global footprint to build to the volume and mix our customers require. Contact Us Marine Learn More Marine ECI supplies custom marine panel assemblies and wire harnesses to the leading Marine OEMs. We engineer our wire harnesses to withstand the harshest marine environments with accuracy and precision. Our custom marine panel assemblies include vacuum forming, vinyl wrapped covering, and Marine/AG/Construction AC control panels. Our dedicated marine facilities execute rapid engineering changes with flexibility and speed. Through engineering expertise and cutting-edge technology, we support our customers from design to delivery. Contact Us Medical Devices Learn More Medical Devices ECI manufactures electrical distribution systems to the highest dependability standards of the Medical Device Industry. We hold leading certifications for all types of medical equipment and applications for critical power, control, and data transfer. Our systems power diagnostic equipment such as X-Ray imaging and MRI equipment, as well as patient and surgical applications. We have the scale and global footprint to build to the volume and mix our customers require. Contact Us Off-Road Recreational Vehicles Learn More Off-Road Recreational Vehicles ECI designs and builds custom wire harnesses that can withstand the most challenging environments, rugged terrains, extreme use, and exacting specifications. We have diverse experience across vehicles and support highly complex to discreet wire preparation. Our wire harnesses and cable assemblies not only power Off-Road and All-Terrain Vehicles, they also drive Gas, Electric, and Hybrid Golf Carts, Lawn Maintenance Systems/Vehicles, and Electric Cars/Trucks. We have the scale and global footprint to build to the volume and mix our customers require. Lion Electric and Electrical Components International: Empowering Sustainable Mobility Together » ECI ECI ENES Menu Company Who We Are Leadership Our Companies Business Ethics Markets Solutions Operations Operational Excellence Global Locations COVID-19 Newsroom Careers Customers Suppliers Contact EN ES NewsroomCompany News Lion Electric and Electrical Components International: Empowering Sustainable Mobility Together Company News Lion Electric and Electrical Components International: Empowering Sustainable Mobility Together Lion Electric and Electrical Components International: Empowering Sustainable Mobility Together Joliet, IL – July 24, 2023 –We are thrilled to celebrate the grand opening of Lion Electric’s state-of-the-art facility dedicated to electric buses and trucks in Joliet, Illinois. This momentous occasion marks a significant milestone in our partnership and our shared commitment to shaping a greener future. The Electrical Components International (ECI) and ProEV leadership team is honored to be part of this inspiring journey. For the past seven years, Lion Electric and ProEV, a division of ECI, have been innovating together. As pioneers in electric transportation and leaders in sustainable electrification, we have come together with a shared vision to revolutionize the way we move and reduce our environmental impact. By combining Lion Electric’s EV and battery technology with ECI’s expertise in electrification solutions, we create a transformative North American ecosystem that brings us closer to our shared goal. This grand opening is not only a new chapter for Lion, but it also symbolizes the collective determination of our ecosystem to lead the charge towards sustainable transportation solutions. As Marc Bedard, CEO and founder of Lion Electric, said at the Joliet Grand Opening, “We are at the forefront of a manufacturing rebirth in the United States, and together with Governor J.B. Pritzker and his team, industry stakeholders and EV advocates, we are creating the next era of transportation in the Midwest, with a critical need to reduce carbon emissions, strengthen the region’s economic vitality, and support sustainability”. These words encapsulate our shared vision and serve as a reminder of the incredible possibilities that lie ahead. Congratulations to Lion Electric on this remarkable occasion! We are excited about the journey ahead and look forward to continuing to lead the way together in sustainable mobility. About ECI Founded in 1953, Electrical Components International (ECI) is one of the world’s leading suppliers of electrical distribution systems, control box assemblies, and other critical engineered components for diversified markets. With 25,000 employees and 40+ global manufacturing locations, ECI is the trusted partner to market leaders with 500+ customers. At ECI, we power smart, connected, and electrified solutions that enable the most advanced technologies to solve the most complex challenges. For more information about ECI, visit www.ecintl.com.
